blog.name: christinasarchive
blog.title: My Archive
blog.description: A collection of fanfiction to read, recipes to eat, and craft projects to try.

summary: A Year Like None Other - aspeninthesunlight
title: A Year Like None Other - aspeninthesunlight
excerpt: A letter from home? A letter from family? Well, Harry Potter knows he has neither, but all the same, it starts with a letter from Surrey. Whatever the Durleys have to say, it can't be anything good, so Harry's determined to ignore it. But then, his evil schoolmate rival spots the letter and his slimy excuse for a teacher intercepts it and forces him to read it. And that sends Harry down a path he'd never have walked on his own. It will be a year of big changes, a year of great pain, and a year of confronting worst fears. It will be a year of surprising discoveries, of finding true strength, of finding out that first impressions of a person's true colours do not always ring true. It will be a year of paradigm shifts. And from the most unexpected sources, Harry will have a chance to have that which he has never known: a home ... and a family. A sixth year fic, this story follows Order of the Phoenix and disregards any canon events that occur after Book 5.

FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: reallyloudstarlight
blog.title: A fangirl who can make you laugh and put you in tears
blog.description: I am a part of a BUNCH of fandoms, ranging from Harry Potter to Percy Jackson and a bunch of other stuff. I also post a lot of deep things that can put you in your feels.

body:
Broadchurch

I was recently just thinking about a crossover between Broadchurch and Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. This is going to be a fanfic I write so please do not take idea (though if you do use it, tag me please).

What if Daniel Latimer’s death was not ordinary?

What is Joe Miller really didn’t do it?

Could it have been an accident?

While Joe Miller is in court, the beach continues to attract tourists despite the low mood of town residents. While children are digging a large hole in the sand for their castle, they come across a strange device. The child’s mother, a former agent, sees it and calls HQ to call in the 0-8-4.

S.H.I.E.L.D gets there and closes the area off.

They do things.

Details. Details. Details.

I know there is a lot of deciding and polishing that needs to be done, but it has a lot of potential.

I might add an OC to make it a bit easier for me because I’m still fairly new to the whole writing thing.

tags: i just thought of draco wearing joggers and narcissa being confused
idk what this post is i havent slept im 2 days
summary: u kno it honestly baffles me how sometimes ppl think that wizards dont know what basic clothes are like the amount of times i...
body: u kno it honestly baffles me how sometimes ppl think that wizards dont know what basic clothes are like the amount of times i see a post where draco is confused or disgusted by harrys hoodies and denim jeans is both funny but its also like???? im sure wizards know what a hoodie is, especially if a damn good portion of them are muggleborn/raised or whatever. whenever a bunch of wizards express confusion over smthn like joggers im like, ??? dude are these guys always dressed in satin dress pants like what?? ok maybe a reclusive pureblood whos always dressed to the nines with a pocketwatch to match named draco has an excuse but like anyone else??? go outside u weirdos

blog.name: ventoserenowrites
blog.title: VentoSereno
blog.description:
A Remadora fic blog, with intersectional feminist content [by someone who really ought to be getting on with other things]. 
Do I understand how Tumblr works? Can't say that I do, no. But I do sound like I'm from London. Find the rest of my scribblings on A03!

body:
I should really, really go.

“I should really, really go.”

She’s attacking his neck with renewed vigour. “Why bother? It’s almost morning. You may as well stay”. She returns her lips to his and they do not resurface for a few minutes.


“You know I can't…”


“Says who? I say you can. I don’t see anyone else who needs consulting around here.”


Another pause whilst the finer points of this argument are battled out with their tongues, rather than with words. She feels like they would both win, if they debated their issues this way more often.


“I am going to go. I’ve decided. I’m extremely firm when I’ve made up my mind.” But he makes no attempt to move and she’s crawled back onto his lap and that adds a frisson to the proceedings which needs to be explored.


“Right. I am really, really going to go now.”


“No, you’re not.”


“Yes, I am.”


After another long while he finally begins to pull away. He strokes her hair back from her face, and kisses her nose, her forehead, the back of her hand. He then shifts her gently off his lap, more determined to leave. She lets him go regretfully.


He gets up, and sneakily re-arranges himself. She smirks as he tries to hide the evidence of his arousal. He hadn’t been able to hide the hardness she’d felt against her thigh for the last hour. He runs a hand through his hair, straightens his robe, and she stands up, and wraps her arms around him.


“Stay.” she whispers in his ear and slips her hand down. He’s too quick for her, though, and stops her before she can get anywhere interesting.


He turns and kisses her, though, which feels like a reward of sorts.


“I love you. You know that, don’t you?” she says, when they break apart.


He strokes her hair and looks at her sadly. He nods. She nudges him. “You’re meant to say it back, you know.”


“Yes.” He agrees. “But won’t it just make things worse?”


“I’ll make things a whole lot worse for you if you don’t say it right this second. I’ll hex you into next week if you…” he interrupts her with a kiss of such blazing intensity her knees go weak and she holds onto him, tightly.


When they break apart he whispers it, very softly against her lips, so she barely catches it: “I love you”.


He still leaves, though. The next day, try as she might, her hair stays a lank, mousey brown. She won’t be able to shift it for another 12 months.

summary:
Remus: It was just a little slip-up.
Sirius: Slip up? A dozen owls to the Auror's office about a monstrous dog-boy running...
body:
Remus: It was just a little slip-up.
Sirius: Slip up? A dozen owls to the Auror's office about a monstrous dog-boy running around the streets of Hogsmeade naked.
James: Why were you naked?
Remus: It was really hot out that night, okay?

summary: “É como vidro quebrado. Um milhão de pedaços que nunca estarão intactos novamente. Quando algo se parte dentro de você, não há...
caption:
“É como vidro quebrado. Um milhão de pedaços que nunca estarão intactos novamente. Quando algo se parte dentro de você, não há reparo. Crescer é ser estilhaçado. Ver pequenas partes de sua alma se fragmentarem e conviver com as rachaduras em seu espírito. Machuca. Sangra. Doí.  E é necessário. Afinal, eventualmente aprende-se a lidar com o amontoado de cacos de vidro em seu coração e encontrar a beleza em todas essas pequenas destruições.”

Estilhaços, prólogo (x)

Afinal, eventualmente aprende-se a lidar com o amontoado de cacos de vidro em seu coração e encontrar a beleza em todas essas pequenas destruições.”

Estilhaços, prólogo (x)
